alert.note: Alert for Malheur County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 1:37PM PDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Malheur County through 215 PM PDT... At 137 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Iron Point, or 24 miles north of Rome, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Iron Point around 250 PM MDT. Sacramento Butte around 300 PM MDT. Saddle Butte around 310 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
